content: use up your scraps and minis to to make this simple and fun wrap using the half-fisherman s rib stitch this whole pattern is literally 2 row repeated throughout - it s free so download for more information on how i blended the colours and what yarns i used this pattern is also very easy to modify to make it smaller less wide reduce your cast on stitches to a smaller odd number just remember you will need to knit more row of the pattern to use up your mini skein if you do this if you have any questions about modifcations please send me a message on ravelry or at knittedbyjacquiverbeek@gmail com happy knitting jacqui
